text: i`lemu enneme-lhayatu-ddunya le`ibuv velehvuv vezinetuv vetefahurum beynekum vetekasurun fi-l'emvali vel'evlad. kemeseli gaysin a`cebe-lkuffara nebatuhu summe yehicu feterahu musferran summe yekunu hutama. vefi-l'ahirati `azabun sediduv vemagfiratum mine-llahi veridvan. veme-lhayatu-ddunya illa meta`u-lgurur
